thread.title: How To Dress Outside The Binary On A Budget
thread.title_full: How To Dress Outside The Binary On A Budget

author: Branson LB
title: How To Dress Outside The Binary On A Budget
text:
View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10715910 2. While personal shopping services are available, they can be expensive . View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10715914 3. We sent Ian and Doreen, who both dress outside the binary, on a shopping trip to see if they could find outfits for under $150. Facebook: video.php ID: 10721227 4. Our first stop was Beacon’s Closet, a thrift store in Manhattan. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10715936 5. While Ian found a ton of clothes, Doreen struggled to find her size. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10715964 6. Which brings us to shopping tip #1: Be patient. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10715971 7. You never know when you might find something that catches your eye! View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10715974 8. Shopping Tip #2: Payless is a great place for trans and non-binary femmes to find cute and affordable shoes. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716031 9. Next stop was Nordstrom Rack, where Doreen seemed to find most of her outfits. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716132 10. Shopping tip #3: Check out the clearance section first. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716213 11. After we finished shopping, we headed back to the office to try everything on. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716240 12. Doreen’s first outfit came from Beacon’s Closet, where she found a vest for for $12.95. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716244 13. Her second outfit was mostly from the men’s section in Nordstrom rack. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716249 14. The whole outfit was bringing her back to her college days. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716274 15. Ian’s first outfit, a warm sweater paired with leggings and boots they already owned, came from Beacon’s closet. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716283 16. Ian’s second outfit was from their two favorite places: a thrift store and Payless. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716288 17. They felt confident and beautiful. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716333 18. Although shopping outside the binary can be difficult at times, at the end of the day you should wear what makes you comfortable — clothes, after all, shouldn’t have a gender. View this image ›
BuzzFeed News ID: 10716732 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Branson LB is an LGBT video producer for BuzzFeed News and is based in New York. Contact Branson LB at branson.lb@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
